thread.section_title: South Florida Sports News - Sun Sentinel
thread.title: Tennessee Titans have improved, despite their 1-3 record
thread.title_full: Tennessee Titans have improved, despite their 1-3 record - Sun Sentinel

author: John Glennon
title: Tennessee Titans have improved, despite their 1-3 record
text:
With one quarter of the 2015 season behind them, the Tennessee Titans sit exactly where they did a year ago: They're sporting a 1-3 record after suffering three consecutive losses.
The numbers would suggest, however, that this is a much different team than the 2014 version at the same point — offensively, defensively and in terms of being competitive.
Whereas last year’s Titans were already floundering on the way to losing 14 of their final 15 games, this year’s Titans could have — and probably should have — won their last two games.
Does putting up better numbers and playing more respectably make the Titans feel like they’re closer to turning things around? Or is 1-3 just as disheartening as it was a year ago?
Click here to read the rest of this story on tennessean.com.
